arts.ttl: The lowdown on Charlton Athletic 1 Stockport County 1 - Addicks unable to turn dominance into victory
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic: Mannion, Gillesphey, Mitchell, Edwards, Ramsay (Edmonds-Green 37), T Campbell, Docherty (Leaburn 62), Taylor (Dixon 89), Anderson, A Campbell (Berry 45), Godden. An impressive Charlton display finally saw them level thanks to Rarmani Edmonds-Green’s first goal for the club midway through the second-period.

arts.ttl: Rarmani Edmonds-Green hits Charlton equaliser in draw with Stockport
Charlton Athletic young defender signs new long-term contract - penning deal until at least 2027
arts.sum: “I’ve obviously been here for a long time and I’ve got a strong affinity to the club, so I’m really pleased to be extending my time here,” said Mitchell, who is one of eight academy graduates to feature for Nathan Jones this season. Charlton Athletic have announced that academy graduate Zach Mitchell has signed a new long-term contract with the club.

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic striker ruled out for Stockport County clash
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic striker Dan Kanu will miss their clash this weekend, as detailed in a report by London… The post Charlton Athletic striker ruled out for Stockport County clash appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
